data.current_summary: Render a URL as an image or video
data.summary_suggestion: Capture a screenshot of a webpage synchronously
data.description_suggestion: Captures a screenshot of a webpage from a provided URL or HTML content and returns the rendered image synchronously. Accepts a RenderRequest object with configuration options for rendering parameters (dimensions, format, wait times, etc.). Returns the rendered image data directly in the response. This is a blocking operation that waits for the render to complete before returning. Useful for immediate screenshot capture without polling.
